gloss: an animal trained for and used for heavy labor / motherless calf in a range herd of cattle / small donkey used as a pack animal
a domestic animal (especially a young steer or heifer) kept as stock until fattened or matured and suitable for a breeding establishment

a huge quadrupedal herbivore with long neck and tail; of late Jurassic in western North America / common greyish-brown burrowing animal native to southern Europe and northern Africa but introduced elsewhere; widely domesticated and developed in various colors and for various needs; young are born naked and helpless / solid-hoofed herbivorous quadruped domesticated since prehistoric times
